share_with_clinician: Share your wellness pattern with clinician wey you trust.
clinician_visibility_note: Dem go see your FWI, trends and compliance signal — no be your raw logs, diary or Medical Vault.
share_code_with_clinician: Share dis code with your clinician (e dey valid for 7 days):
invite_code_error: Error dey to create invite code
invalid_invite_code: Invite code no valid or don expire
already_connected: You don already connect to dis person
connected_as_clinician: You don connect to dis person APP Platform as clinician.
functional_patterns_only: You go only see functional patterns and trends — no raw logs or Medical Vault content.
data_visibility_explanation: Professionals dey only see your functional wellness index and compliance signal — no raw logs or Medical Vault content.
no_connections: You never get any care team connection.
pending_status: Your clinician profile dey under review. You still fit receive invite from patients and preview functional signals.
approved_status: Dem don approve you as clinician for Wellio. Patients fit invite you to see their functional wellness patterns.
